meanings.definition: A person who advocates or engages in revolution.
meanings.sent1: The group of revolutionaries gathered to plan their next move.
meanings.sent2: The revolutionaries fought for freedom and equality.
meanings.sent3: The revolutionaries decided to have a dance-off to determine the leader.
meanings.sent4: Their ideas were like sparks, igniting the minds of the revolutionaries.
meanings.sent5: The image of the revolutionaries waving flags will forever be etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characteristic of a revolution.
meanings.sent1: The revolutionary ideas sparked change in society.
meanings.sent2: The flag symbolized the revolutionary spirit of the people.
meanings.sent3: The revolutionary cupcakes were a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her speech had a revolutionary impact on the audience.
meanings.sent5: The revolutionary fervor spread like wildfire among the people.
